<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a new Fraud Marker"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/pix/anti-fraud"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a fraud marker.

   ### Idempotence
   The fraud tag creation operation is idempotent. To guarantee the idempotence of the operation, the request
   has a `clientRequestId` field, which must be unique in the context of the same participant.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixInfractionReportRequest","description":"","required":["taxIdNumber","fraudType","clientRequestId"],"type":"object","properties":{"taxIdNumber":{"description":"CPF or CNPJ of the user to which the fraud marking will be associated.","pattern":"([0-9]{11}|[0-9]{14})","type":"string"},"fraudType":{"description":"Type of fraud. For fraud marking coming from infraction reports closeds in api v1, the value UNKNOWN will appear.","enum":["APPLICATION_FRAUD","MULE_ACCOUNT","SCAMMER_ACCOUNT","OTHER","UNKNOWN"],"type":"string"},"key":{"description":"Identifier of the transaction settled in the SPI.","pattern":"\\w{8,32}","type":"string"},"clientRequestId":{"description":"An unique identification given by the client side. This value can not be repeated on a next call.","type":"string"}},"example":{"taxIdNumber":"some text","details":"some text","fraudType":"MULE_ACCOUNT","key":"some text"}},"examples":{"PixInfractionReportRequest":{"value":{"clientRequestId":"7e8789ac-4acc-4815-9ff0-02da04ee5ab2","taxIdNumber":"01234567890","fraudType":"MULE_ACCOUNT","key":"abc@pix.br"}}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
